name: Multiwall
body:
### Welcome to multiwall.
To retrieve your wallpapers from momentumdash app (flickr ones):

```
$ git clone http://github.com/rishabhgpt
$ cd multiwall
$ chmod 755 momentum imgur
$ crontab -e

```
Now add momentum script as daily cronjob

```

$ 0 10 * * * /path/to/multiwall/momentum

```

Similar process for imgur script



### Authors and Contributors
Drop mail to me (@rishabhgpt) for hugs or bugs.

### Support or Contact
If you find some content your copyright, well its on Internet right ??
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
